class.name: Script
class.brief_description: A class stored as a resource.
class.description: A class stored as a resource. A script exends the functionality of all objects that instance it. The [code]new[/code] method of a script subclass creates a new instance. [method Object.set_script] extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the script can be instanced.

method.name: get_base_script
method.description: Returns the script directly inherited by this script.

method.name: has_script_signal
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the script, or a base class, defines a signal with the given name.

method.name: has_source_code
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the script contains non-empty source code.

method.name: instance_has
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [code]base_object[/code] is an instance of this script.

method.name: is_tool
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the script is a tool script. A tool script can run in the editor.

method.name: reload
method.description: Reloads the script's class implementation. Returns an error code.

members.member: The script source code or an empty string if source code is not available. When set, does not reload the class implementation automatically.
